summary: A chance encounter alters a teenage girl's perception of herself and her outlook on life.
cast: Heather Matarazzo|Zach Braff|David Aaron Baker|Catherine Anne Hayes|Craig Anthony Grant|Michael Weston|Richard Bright|Celia Weston|Bebe Neuwirth|Mark Blum|Bo Hopkins|Tom Gilroy|Tristine Skyler|Sonja Sohn|Richard Alliger|Chris Noth|Kevin Black|Dilyn Cassel|Mary McCormack|Jacob Reynolds|Leo Burmester|Peggy Gormley|Jonathan Hogan|Jonathan Bray|Seymour Cassel|Michael Rubenstein
title: Getting to Know You
